pageTitle: UPDATE - Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 9, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Premier of the Northwest Territories, Caroline Cochrane.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Premier of the Yukon, Sandy Silver.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Halton Region, Ontario

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in CTV’s Toy Mountain campaign.
